mapper.insert: insert into newscate(newscateno, genre, name, cnt, seqno, visible, rdate) values(newscate.nextval, #{genre}, #{name}, 0, #{seqno}, #{visible}, sysdate)
mapper.update: Update newscate Set seqno=seqno-1 Where newscateno=#{newscateno}
Update newscate Set seqno=seqno+1 Where newscateno=#{newscateno}
mapper.select: select newscateno, genre, name, cnt, seqno, visible, rdate From newscate order by seqno ASC
mapper.update: Update newscate SET visible='Y' Where newscateno=#{newscateno}
Update newscate SET visible='N' Where newscateno=#{newscateno}
mapper.select: Select newscateno, genre, name, cnt, seqno, visible, rdate From newscate Where name ='--' AND visible = 'Y' order by seqno ASC
Select genre From newscate Where name = '--' Order by seqno ASC

Select newscateno, genre, name, cnt, seqno, visible, rdate From newscate
WHERE (UPPER(genre) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%' ) OR (UPPER(name) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%')
Order by seqno ASC

Select Count(*) as cnt From newscate
WHERE (UPPER(genre) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%' ) OR (UPPER(name) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%')
Order by seqno ASC

SELECT newscateno, genre, name, cnt, seqno, visible, rdate, r FROM ( SELECT newscateno, genre, name, cnt, seqno, visible, rdate, rownum as r FROM ( SELECT newscateno, genre, name, cnt, seqno, visible, rdate FROM newscate WHERE (UPPER(genre) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%') OR (UPPER(name) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%') ORDER BY seqno ASC ) ) WHERE r >= #{start_num} AND r <= #{end_num}
